requirements: Complete Act 3 in the Imaginarium Theater on any difficulty.
Complete Act 6 in the Imaginarium Theater on any difficulty.
Complete Act 8 in the Imaginarium Theater on any difficulty.
Complete an entire performance in the Imaginarium Theater after having invited a Supporting Cast character.
Complete an entire performance in the Imaginarium Theater on any difficulty having selected at least 8 Mystery Cache events.
Complete an entire performance in the Imaginarium Theater on any difficulty having selected at least 8 Wondrous Boon or Brilliant Blessings events.
Obtain a total of 3 Toy Medals.
Obtain a total of 6 Toy Medals.
Obtain a total of 9 Toy Medals.
Learn 3 total Thespian Tricks from Wolfy's Thespian Trove.
